import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent { title = 'tienda_cdsOnline_angular'; constructor(private router:Router){ } ngOnInit():void{ this.router.navigate(["listado"]); } } Tienda cds
